mapper.insert:
INSERT ignore into tbl_stock_net_worth( stock_code, time, stock_name, stock_net_worth, create_time, modify_time ) VALUES
( #{stockNetWorth.stockCode}, #{stockNetWorth.time}, #{stockNetWorth.stockName}, #{stockNetWorth.stockNetWorth}, now(), now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stock_name=VALUES(stock_name), stock_net_worth=VALUES(stock_net_worth), create_time=VALUES(create_time), modify_time=VALUES(modify_time)
